name: Team Knowledge of Azuth: Azuth
description:
Azuth is a metroidvania-style platformer where you play as Azuth, Lord of Spells. The goal is to reach the end of the level. Along the way you'll need to avoid the spikes the litter your path and face off against orcs that block your path.

Controls

  • Movement - Arrow Keys or WASD
  • Jump - Space
  • Aim and Shoot - Mouse

Team

  • Project Lead and Artist - Emma Winters
  • Programming - Cesar Moreira, Istvan Franczuz, Thom Weeks, Fabio Pereira
  • Sound Design - Thom Weeks
  • Editor - Joseph Hunt
